content:
/>
VI.iii.3.C.4.a
.
Action to Take if an Unsuccessful Claimant Fails to Respond to the Decision Notice
If an unsuccessful claimant fails to submit a notice of disagreement within 60 days of the date of the notice described in
M21-1, Part VI, Subpart iii, 3.C.3.a
, pay benefits to the successful claimant.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart iii, Chapter 3, Section C - Authorizing and Notifying Claimants of a Decision on a Contested Claim
citation: Part VI, Subpart iii, Chapter 3, Section C
